name: ConditionalFormat
description: An object encapsulating a conditional format's range, format, rule, and other properties.

properties.name: stopIfTrue
properties.description: If the conditions of this conditional format are met, no lower-priority formats shall take effect on that cell.

properties.name: priority
properties.description: The priority (or index) within the conditional format collection that this conditional format currently exists in. Changing this also

properties.name: type
properties.description: A type of conditional format. Only one can be set at a time. Read-Only.

properties.name: dataBar
properties.description: Represents databars with customizable color, gradient, axis, and range format options.

properties.name: dataBarOrNullObject
properties.description: Represents databars with customizable color, gradient, axis, and range format options.

properties.name: custom
properties.description: A custom conditional format and rule.

properties.name: customOrNullObject
properties.description: A custom conditional format and rule.

properties.name: colorScale
properties.description: Represents a Color Scale conditional format.

properties.name: colorScaleOrNullObject
properties.description: Represents a Color Scale conditional format.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Returns the range the conditonal format is applied to or a null object if the range is discontiguous. Read-only.

methods.name: getRangeOrNullObject
methods.description: Returns the range the conditonal format is applied to or a null object if the range is discontiguous. Read-only.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
